Segment.name: BEG
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Purchase Order Transaction Set and transmit identifying numbers and dates

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: PurchaseOrderTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of Purchase Order

Field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Field.name: ReleaseNumber
Field.comment: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: AcknowledgmentType
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment

Field.name: InvoiceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code defining the method by which invoices are to be processed

Field.name: PurchaseCategory
Field.comment: Code identifying the broad category of products or services being acquired

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: TransactionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of transaction
